name: Taman Anna: Belajar Buah & Sayur
description:
Taman Anna: Belajar Buah & Sayur

Let's get to know the names of fruits and vegetables with Anna!

Features:

Dictionary
Get to know fruits and vegetables using a dictionary, with pictures of fruits and vegetables that attract the attention of children. The sound that appears when a picture is pressed makes it easy for children to memorize the names of fruits and vegetables.

Quiz
Let's test your skills, a fun quiz with a time and score system that you will get when solving all questions.

Settings
Set your own quiz time and number, you can choose the time quiz seconds per question, and also choose the number of questions you will answer can be up to 20 questions.
